title: Melee champions should have more damage or tank potential than ranged champions
body:
A melee carry should scale harder than a ranged carry.

A melee tank should tank harder than a ranged tank.

A melee crowd controller should have better crowd control than a ranged crowd controller.

Range gives so much power that it's ridiculous. I do *not* think that ranged champions should do more or similar damage to melee champions when melee champions have to risk their neck to do what the ranged champion does without trying.
